## Sprint 7: V2 Onboarding Hub

**Duration**: 1.5 weeks  
**Priority**: Medium  
**Goal**: Complete onboarding portal and automation

### Tasks

- [ ] **Onboarding Portal UI**
  - [ ] "Start Here" hub page
  - [ ] Step-by-step guide
  - [ ] Resource links
  - [ ] Checklist system
  - [ ] Progress tracking

- [ ] **Onboarding Resources**
  - [ ] Wi-Fi setup guide
  - [ ] Roll marking instructions
  - [ ] Room booking guide
  - [ ] Photocopier instructions
  - [ ] Key contacts list
  - [ ] School map

- [ ] **Automation Enhancements**
  - [ ] Trigger onboarding on new staff detection
  - [ ] Auto-create onboarding tasks
  - [ ] Send welcome emails
  - [ ] Add to Teams automatically
  - [ ] Grant SharePoint permissions

- [ ] **Offboarding Automation**
  - [ ] Trigger on staff departure
  - [ ] Remove from Teams
  - [ ] Archive data
  - [ ] Transfer ownership
  - [ ] Generate exit checklist

### Acceptance Criteria

- ✅ New staff can access onboarding hub
- ✅ Onboarding tasks are created automatically
- ✅ Resources are easily accessible
- ✅ Automation works reliably
- ✅ Offboarding process is smooth

### Dependencies

- V1 complete
- Onboarding service implemented
- SharePoint resources ready

### Notes

This reduces onboarding time and ensures new staff have everything they need.
